statements: DELETE FROM travel_itineraries WHERE cultural_site IS NULL;
DELETE FROM travel_itineraries WHERE itinerary_id = 101 AND cultural_site IS NULL;
DELETE FROM cultural_sites WHERE site_name = 'Taj Mahal';
DELETE FROM itinerary_sites WHERE itinerary_id = '456e7890-12d3-45a6-bcde-789012345678' AND site_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM itinerary_sites WHERE duration_hours > 4 AND visit_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cultural_sites WHERE location = 'Paris' OR location = 'Rome';
